column4: how do i access the root terminal, if i wanna install the game vdrift?
how do i access the root terminal, if i wanna install the game vdrift?
If this doesn't work, Ubuntu fellas broke something it seems, sorry for you.
i did it... but now what? retype it?
is it possible that the problem is that im following instructions for hardy?
i typed this: sudo apt-get install google-gadgets-gt, and got: E: Couldn't find package google-gadgets-gt... Do u you know how/ where i can download it from?
How would it know whether it works "fine"?
wat happens is i open it up, and type something in, but no search options come up. And when it worked, the search options did come up
Yeah, but i've no idea why you'd run it as root. Altho if instructions say so...
It's WINE, but it also gets game-specific patches and stuff.
